info.title: Text Proofreading
info.description: A service for automatic proofreading of multilingual texts. This module uses multilingual Natural Language Processing technology to check the spelling, grammar and style of your texts with high accuracy, in order to provide precise and up-to-date suggestions and educational explanations based on references. It also provides a number of configuration parameters that allow the user to obtain the corrections in different formats and to customize the behavior for certain types of errors.

parameters.name: alw
parameters.description: Warn of foreign words to be avoided. More information at https://textalytics.com/core/stilus-info

parameters.name: aqoi
parameters.description: Smart handling of words written in italics or with quotation marks. More information at https://textalytics.com/core/stilus-info

parameters.name: dic
parameters.description: This parameter will specify the list of active dictionaries that will be used in the topic extraction. More info at https://textalytics.com/core/stilus-info

parameters.name: dpn
parameters.description: Smart detection of proper nouns. More information at https://textalytics.com/core/stilus-info

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language for the input text. The only possible value is 'es'.

parameters.name: pp
parameters.description: Smart detection of prefixed words. More information at https://textalytics.com/core/stilus-info

parameters.name: txt
parameters.description: Input text. It can be plain text, HTML or XML, always using UTF-8 encoding. (Required if 'url' and 'doc' are empty).

parameters.name: txtf
parameters.description: The text format parameter specifies if the text included in the txt parameter uses markup language that needs to be interpreted. Possible values are 'plain', 'markup'. Required if txt has some value.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL with the content to analyze. Currently only non-authenticated HTTP and FTP are supported. The content types supported for URL contents can be found here. (Required if 'txt' and 'doc' are empty).

parameters.name: wct
parameters.description: Warn of confusion between terms. More information at https://textalytics.com/core/stilus-info
